articles.title: Belgium Urges Apple To Update iPhone 12 Software Across European Union - NDTV
articles.description: Belgium's state secretary for digitalisation said on Friday he had asked Apple to upgrade the iPhone 12 software across EU countries, adding however that based on a preliminary review by the Belgian regulator the handset presents no danger to users.
articles.content:
Belgium said it would review potential health risks linked to Apple's iPhone 12 (Representational)
Brussels: Belgium's state secretary for digitalisation said on Friday he had asked Apple to upgrade… [+722 chars]
